trans-unit.source: Provides support for creating and scheduling <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Task" /> objects.
trans-unit.target: 提供对创建和计划 <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Task" /> 对象的支持。

trans-unit.source: The .NET Framework provides two factories for creating and scheduling tasks:
trans-unit.target: .NET Framework 提供了对创建和计划任务的两个工厂：

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskFactory> class, which creates <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task> and <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task%601> objects.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskFactory>类，该类创建<xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task>和<xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task%601>对象。

trans-unit.source: You can call the overloads of this method to create and execute a task that requires non-default arguments.
trans-unit.target: 你可以调用此方法创建和执行的任务需要非默认自变量的重载。

trans-unit.source: Starting with the [!INCLUDE[net_v45](~/includes/net-v45-md.md)], the <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task.Run%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method provides the easiest way to create a task with default configuration values and start it immediately.
trans-unit.target: 从开始[!INCLUDE[net_v45](~/includes/net-v45-md.md)]、<xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task.Run%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法提供的最简单的方法，以使用默认配置值创建任务并立即启动。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskFactory%601> class, which creates <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task%601> objects.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskFactory%601>类，该类创建<xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task%601>对象。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskFactory> class allows you to do the following:
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskFactory>类使您可以执行以下操作：

trans-unit.source: Create a task and start it immediately by calling the <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskFactory.StartNew%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 创建任务并通过调用立即开始<xref:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskFactory.StartNew%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: Starting with the [!INCLUDE[net_v45](~/includes/net-v45-md.md)], the <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task.Run%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method provides the easiest way to create a task with default configuration values and start it immediately.
trans-unit.target: 从开始[!INCLUDE[net_v45](~/includes/net-v45-md.md)]、<xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task.Run%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法提供的最简单的方法，以使用默认配置值创建任务并立即启动。

trans-unit.source: Create a task that starts when any one of the tasks in an array has completed by calling the <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskFactory.ContinueWhenAny%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 创建一个任务，它在任何一个数组中的任务已通过调用完成后开始<xref:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskFactory.ContinueWhenAny%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: Create a task that starts when all the tasks in an array have completed by calling the <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskFactory.ContinueWhenAll%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 创建一个任务，它在数组中的所有任务已通过调用完成都后开始<xref:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskFactory.ContinueWhenAll%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The static <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task%601.Factory%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property returns a default <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskFactory%601> object.
trans-unit.target: 静态<xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task%601.Factory%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>属性返回的默认<xref:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskFactory%601>对象。

trans-unit.source: You can also call one of the <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskFactory> class constructors to configure the <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task> objects that the <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskFactory> class creates.
trans-unit.target: 你还可以调用之一<xref:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskFactory>类构造函数来配置<xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task>对象<xref:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskFactory>类创建。

trans-unit.source: The following example configures a new <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskFactory> object to create tasks that have a specified cancellation token, task creation options, continuation options, and a customized task scheduler.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例将配置一个新<xref:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskFactory>对象来创建具有指定的取消标记、 任务创建选项、 延续选项和自定义的任务计划程序的任务。

trans-unit.source: In most cases, you do not have to instantiate a new <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskFactory> instance.
trans-unit.target: 在大多数情况下，你不需要实例化一个新<xref:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskFactory>实例。

trans-unit.source: Instead, you can use the <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task.Factory%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property, which returns a factory object that uses default values.
trans-unit.target: 相反，你可以使用<xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task.Factory%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>属性，它返回一个工厂对象，使用默认值。

trans-unit.source: You can then call its methods to start new tasks or define task continuations.
trans-unit.target: 然后，你可以调用其方法来启动新任务或定义任务延续。

trans-unit.source: For an illustration, see the example.
trans-unit.target: 有关说明，请参阅示例。

trans-unit.source: The following example uses the static <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task.Factory%2A> property to make two calls to the <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskFactory.StartNew%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例使用静态<xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task.Factory%2A>属性以使两次调用<xref:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskFactory.StartNew%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法。

trans-unit.source: The first populates an array with the names of files in the user's MyDocuments directory, while the second populates an array with the names of subdirectories of the user's MyDocuments directory.
trans-unit.target: 第一个使用来填充数组的用户的我的文档目录中的文件的名称，而第二个使用来填充数组的用户的我的文档目录的子目录的名称。

trans-unit.source: It then calls the <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskFactory.ContinueWhenAll%28System.Threading.Tasks.Task%5B%5D%2CSystem.Action%7BSystem.Threading.Tasks.Task%5B%5D%7D%29?displayProperty=nameWithType> method, which displays information about the number of files and directories in the two arrays after the first two tasks have completed execution.
trans-unit.target: 然后，它调用<xref:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskFactory.ContinueWhenAll%28System.Threading.Tasks.Task%5B%5D%2CSystem.Action%7BSystem.Threading.Tasks.Task%5B%5D%7D%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法，其中的前两个任务已完成执行后显示两个数组中的数量的文件和目录信息。

trans-unit.source: All public and protected members of <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskFactory" /> are thread-safe and may be used concurrently from multiple threads.
trans-unit.target: 所有公共和受保护成员<see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskFactory" />是线程安全的可从多个线程同时使用。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskFactory" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskFactory" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskFactory" /> instance with the default configuration.
trans-unit.target: 使用默认配置初始化 <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskFactory" /> 实例。

trans-unit.source: This constructor creates a <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskFactory> instance with a default configuration.
trans-unit.target: 此构造函数创建<xref:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskFactory>具有默认配置的实例。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskCreationOptions> property is initialized to <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskCreationOptions.None>, the <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskContinuationOptions> property is initialized to <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskContinuationOptions.None>, and the <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskScheduler> property is initialized to the current scheduler (see <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskScheduler.Current%2A>).
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskCreationOptions>属性初始化为<xref:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskCreationOptions.None>、<xref:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskContinuationOptions>属性初始化为<xref:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskContinuationOptions.None>，和<xref:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskScheduler>属性初始化为当前计划程序 (请参阅<xref:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskScheduler.Current%2A>)。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskFactory.CancellationToken" /> that will be assigned to tasks created by this <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskFactory" /> unless another CancellationToken is explicitly specified while calling the factory methods.
trans-unit.target: 将指派给由此 <see cref="P:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskFactory.CancellationToken" /> 创建的任务的 <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskFactory" />，除非在调用工厂方法时显式指定另一个 CancellationToken。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskFactory" /> instance with the specified configuration.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定配置初始化 <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskFactory" /> 实例。

trans-unit.source: This constructor creates a <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskFactory> instance with a default configuration.
trans-unit.target: 此构造函数创建<xref:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskFactory>具有默认配置的实例。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskCreationOptions> property is initialized to <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskCreationOptions.None>, the <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskContinuationOptions> property is initialized to <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskContinuationOptions.None>, and the <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskScheduler> property is initialized to the current scheduler (see <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskScheduler.Current%2A>).
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskCreationOptions>属性初始化为<xref:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskCreationOptions.None>、<xref:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskContinuationOptions>属性初始化为<xref:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskContinuationOptions.None>，和<xref:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskScheduler>属性初始化为当前计划程序 (请参阅<xref:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskScheduler.Current%2A>)。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskScheduler" /> to use to schedule any tasks created with this TaskFactory.
trans-unit.target: 要用于计划使用此 TaskFactory 创建的任何任务的 <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskScheduler" />。

trans-unit.source: A null value indicates that the current TaskScheduler should be used.
trans-unit.target: 一个 null 值，该值指示应使用当前的 TaskScheduler。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskFactory" /> instance with the specified configuration.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定配置初始化 <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskFactory" /> 实例。

trans-unit.source: With this constructor, the <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskCreationOptions> property is initialized to <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskCreationOptions.None>, the <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskContinuationOptions> property is initialized to <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskContinuationOptions.None>, and the <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskScheduler> property is initialized to `scheduler`, unless it's null, in which case the property is initialized to the current scheduler (see <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskScheduler.Current%2A>).
trans-unit.target: 使用此构造函数，<xref:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskCreationOptions>属性初始化为<xref:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskCreationOptions.None>、<xref:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskContinuationOptions>属性初始化为<xref:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskContinuationOptions.None>，和<xref:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskScheduler>属性初始化为`scheduler`，除非它为 null，在这种情况下属性初始化为当前计划程序 (请参阅<xref:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskScheduler.Current%2A>)。

trans-unit.source: The default <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskCreationOptions" /> to use when creating tasks with this TaskFactory.
trans-unit.target: 在使用此 TaskFactory 创建任务时要使用的默认 <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskCreationOptions" />。

trans-unit.source: The default <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskContinuationOptions" /> to use when creating continuation tasks with this TaskFactory.
trans-unit.target: 在使用此 TaskFactory 创建延续任务时要使用的默认 <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskContinuationOptions" />。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskFactory" /> instance with the specified configuration.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定配置初始化 <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskFactory" /> 实例。

trans-unit.source: With this constructor, the <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskCreationOptions> property is initialized to `creationOptions`, the <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskContinuationOptions> property is initialized to `continuationOptions`, and the <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskScheduler> property is initialized to the current scheduler (see <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskScheduler.Current%2A>).
trans-unit.target: 使用此构造函数，<xref:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskCreationOptions>属性初始化为`creationOptions`、<xref:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskContinuationOptions>属性初始化为`continuationOptions`，和<xref:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskScheduler>属性初始化为当前计划程序 (请参阅<xref:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskScheduler.Current%2A>)。

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="creationOptions" /> argument specifies an invalid <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskCreationOptions" /> value.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="creationOptions" /> 参数指定的 <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskCreationOptions" /> 值无效。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the Remarks for <see cref="M:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskFactory.FromAsync(System.Func{System.AsyncCallback,System.Object,System.IAsyncResult},System.Action{System.IAsyncResult},System.Object,System.Threading.Tasks.TaskCreationOptions)" />.
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅 <see cref="M:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskFactory.FromAsync(System.Func{System.AsyncCallback,System.Object,System.IAsyncResult},System.Action{System.IAsyncResult},System.Object,System.Threading.Tasks.TaskCreationOptions)" /> 的备注。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="continuationOptions" /> argument specifies an invalid value.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="continuationOptions" /> 参数指定的值无效。

trans-unit.source: The default <see cref="P:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskFactory.CancellationToken" /> that will be assigned to tasks created by this <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskFactory" /> unless another CancellationToken is explicitly specified while calling the factory methods.
trans-unit.target: 将指派给由此 <see cref="P:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskFactory.CancellationToken" /> 创建的任务的 <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskFactory" />，除非在调用工厂方法时显式指定另一个 CancellationToken。

trans-unit.source: The default <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskCreationOptions" /> to use when creating tasks with this TaskFactory.
trans-unit.target: 在使用此 TaskFactory 创建任务时要使用的默认 <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskCreationOptions" />。

trans-unit.source: The default <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskContinuationOptions" /> to use when creating continuation tasks with this TaskFactory.
trans-unit.target: 在使用此 TaskFactory 创建延续任务时要使用的默认 <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskContinuationOptions" />。

trans-unit.source: The default <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskScheduler" /> to use to schedule any Tasks created with this TaskFactory.
trans-unit.target: 要用于计划使用此 TaskFactory 创建的任何任务的默认 <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskScheduler" />。

trans-unit.source: A null value indicates that TaskScheduler.Current should be used.
trans-unit.target: 一个 null 值，该值指示应使用 TaskScheduler.Current。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskFactory" /> instance with the specified configuration.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定配置初始化 <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskFactory" /> 实例。

trans-unit.source: With this constructor, the <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskCreationOptions> property is initialized to `creationOptions`, the <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskContinuationOptions> property is initialized to `continuationOptions`, and the <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskScheduler> property is initialized to `scheduler`, unless it's null, in which case the property is initialized to the current scheduler (see <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskScheduler.Current%2A>).
trans-unit.target: 使用此构造函数，<xref:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskCreationOptions>属性初始化为`creationOptions`、<xref:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskContinuationOptions>属性初始化为`continuationOptions`，和<xref:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskScheduler>属性初始化为`scheduler`，除非它为 null，在这种情况下属性初始化为当前计划程序 (请参阅<xref:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskScheduler.Current%2A>)。

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="creationOptions" /> argument specifies an invalid <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskCreationOptions" /> value.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="creationOptions" /> 参数指定的 <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskCreationOptions" /> 值无效。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the Remarks for <see cref="M:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskFactory.FromAsync(System.Func{System.AsyncCallback,System.Object,System.IAsyncResult},System.Action{System.IAsyncResult},System.Object,System.Threading.Tasks.TaskCreationOptions)" />.
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅 <see cref="M:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskFactory.FromAsync(System.Func{System.AsyncCallback,System.Object,System.IAsyncResult},System.Action{System.IAsyncResult},System.Object,System.Threading.Tasks.TaskCreationOptions)" /> 的备注。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="continuationOptions" /> argument specifies an invalid value.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="continuationOptions" /> 参数指定的值无效。

trans-unit.source: Gets the default cancellation token for this task factory.
trans-unit.target: 获取此任务工厂的默认取消标记。

trans-unit.source: The default task cancellation token for this task factory.
trans-unit.target: 此任务工厂的默认任务取消标记。

trans-unit.source: This property returns the default <xref:System.Threading.CancellationToken> that will be assigned to all tasks created by this factory, unless another <xref:System.Threading.CancellationToken> value is explicitly specified during the call to the factory methods.
trans-unit.target: 此属性返回的默认<xref:System.Threading.CancellationToken>，会将其分配到此工厂创建的所有任务，除非另一个<xref:System.Threading.CancellationToken>值显式指定在调用工厂方法的过程。

trans-unit.source: Gets the default task continuation options for this task factory.
trans-unit.target: 获取此任务工厂的默认任务继续选项。

trans-unit.source: The default task continuation options for this task factory.
trans-unit.target: 此任务工厂的默认任务继续选项。

trans-unit.source: The property value is used to create all continuation tasks, unless other options are explicitly specified during calls to this factory's methods.
trans-unit.target: 属性值用于创建所有延续任务，除非过程对此工厂方法的调用中显式指定了其他选项。

trans-unit.source: Creates a continuation task that starts when a set of specified tasks has completed.
trans-unit.target: 创建一个延续任务，该任务在一组指定的任务完成后开始。

trans-unit.source: The array of tasks from which to continue.
trans-unit.target: 继续执行的任务所在的数组。

trans-unit.source: The action delegate to execute when all tasks in the <c>tasks</c> array have completed.
trans-unit.target: 在 <c>tasks</c> 数组中的所有任务完成时要执行的操作委托。

trans-unit.source: Creates a continuation task that starts when a set of specified tasks has completed.
trans-unit.target: 创建一个延续任务，该任务在一组指定的任务完成后开始。

trans-unit.source: The new continuation task.
trans-unit.target: 新的延续任务。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskFactory.ContinueWhenAll%2A> method executes the `continuationAction` delegate when all tasks in the `tasks` array have completed, regardless of their completion status.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskFactory.ContinueWhenAll%2A>方法执行`continuationAction`委托中的所有任务时`tasks`数组已完成，而不考虑及其完成状态。

trans-unit.source: Exceptions thrown by tasks in the `tasks` array are not available to the continuation task through structured exception handling.
trans-unit.target: 中的任务引发的异常`tasks`数组均不可用于通过结构化的异常处理的延续任务。

trans-unit.source: You can determine which exceptions were thrown by examining the <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task.Exception%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property of each task in the `tasks` array.
trans-unit.target: 你可以确定通过检查引发哪些异常<xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task.Exception%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>中每项任务的属性`tasks`数组。

trans-unit.source: To use structured exception handling to handle exceptions thrown by tasks in the `tasks` array, call the <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task.WaitAll%28System.Threading.Tasks.Task%5B%5D%29?displayProperty=nameWithType> method.
trans-unit.target: 使用结构化的异常处理程序来处理由任务引发的异常`tasks`数组，请调用<xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task.WaitAll%28System.Threading.Tasks.Task%5B%5D%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法。

trans-unit.source: The following example launches separate tasks that use a regular expression to count the number of words in a set of text files.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例将启动单独的任务，使用正则表达式计算一组文本文件中单词的数目。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskFactory.ContinueWhenAll%2A> method is used to launch a task that displays the total word count when all the antecedent tasks have completed.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskFactory.ContinueWhenAll%2A>方法用于启动所有前面的任务已完成时显示总字数统计的任务。

trans-unit.source: The call to the continuation task's <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task.Wait%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method does not allow it to handle exceptions thrown by the antecedent tasks, so the example examines the <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task.Status%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property of each antecedent task to determine whether the task succeeded.
trans-unit.target: 延续任务的调用<xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task.Wait%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法不允许其处理引发的前面的任务，因此该示例检查异常<xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task.Status%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>的每个先行任务，以确定任务是否成功的属性。

trans-unit.source: An element in the <paramref name="tasks" /> array has been disposed.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="tasks" /> 数组中的一个元素已被释放。

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="tasks" /> array is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="tasks" /> 数组为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="continuationAction" /> argument is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="continuationAction" /> 参数为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="tasks" /> array is empty or contains a null value.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="tasks" /> 数组为空或包含 null 值。

trans-unit.source: The array of tasks from which to continue.
trans-unit.target: 继续执行的任务所在的数组。

trans-unit.source: The action delegate to execute when all tasks in the <c>tasks</c> array have completed.
trans-unit.target: 在 <c>tasks</c> 数组中的所有任务完成时要执行的操作委托。

trans-unit.source: The cancellation token to assign to the new continuation task.
trans-unit.target: 将指派给新的延续任务的取消标记。

trans-unit.source: Creates a continuation task that starts when a set of specified tasks has completed.
trans-unit.target: 创建一个延续任务，该任务在一组指定的任务完成后开始。

trans-unit.source: The new continuation task.
trans-unit.target: 新的延续任务。

trans-unit.source: The [\], Action(Task\<xref:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskFactory.ContinueWhenAll%28System.Threading.Tasks.Task%5B%5D%2CSystem.Action%7BSystem.Threading.Tasks.Task%5B%5D%7D%2CSystem.Threading.CancellationToken%29> method executes the `continuationAction` delegate when all tasks in the `tasks` array have completed, regardless of their completion status.
trans-unit.target: The [\], Action(Task\<xref:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskFactory.ContinueWhenAll%28System.Threading.Tasks.Task%5B%5D%2CSystem.Action%7BSystem.Threading.Tasks.Task%5B%5D%7D%2CSystem.Threading.CancellationToken%29> method executes the `continuationAction` delegate when all tasks in the `tasks` array have completed, regardless of their completion status.

trans-unit.source: The following example creates a cancellation token, which it passes to separate tasks that use a regular expression to count the number of words in a set of text files.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例创建一个取消令牌，将其传递到单独的任务，使用正则表达式计算一组文本文件中单词的数目。

trans-unit.source: The cancellation token is set if a file cannot be found.
trans-unit.target: 如果找不到文件，设置的取消标记。

trans-unit.source: The [\], Action(Task\<xref:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskFactory.ContinueWhenAll%2A> method is used to launch a task that displays the total word count when all the antecedent tasks have completed.
trans-unit.target: [\]，操作 (任务\<xref:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskFactory.ContinueWhenAll%2A > 方法用于启动所有前面的任务已完成时显示总字数统计的任务。

trans-unit.source: If the cancellation token is set, which indicates that one or more tasks have been cancelled, it handles the <xref:System.AggregateException> exception and displays an error message.
trans-unit.target: 如果设置的取消标记，指示已取消一个或多个任务，它将处理<xref:System.AggregateException>异常并显示一条错误消息。

trans-unit.source: Creates a <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Task`1" /> that represents a pair of begin and end methods that conform to the Asynchronous Programming Model pattern.

trans-unit.source: Gets the default task scheduler for this task factory.
trans-unit.target: 获取此任务工厂的默认任务计划程序。

trans-unit.source: The default task scheduler for this task factory.
trans-unit.target: 此任务工厂的默认任务计划程序。

trans-unit.source: The property value is used to schedule all tasks, unless another scheduler is explicitly specified during calls to this factory's methods.
trans-unit.target: 属性值用于计划的所有任务，除非过程对此工厂方法的调用中显式指定另一个计划程序。

trans-unit.source: If this property value is `null`, the value of the <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskScheduler.Current%2A> property is used.
trans-unit.target: 如果此属性值是`null`的值<xref:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskScheduler.Current%2A>使用属性。

trans-unit.source: Creates and starts a <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Task" />.
trans-unit.target: 创建并启动 <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Task" />。

trans-unit.source: Starting with the [!INCLUDE[net_v45](~/includes/net-v45-md.md)], the <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task.Run%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method is the recommended way to launch a compute-bound task.
trans-unit.target: 从开始[!INCLUDE[net_v45](~/includes/net-v45-md.md)]、<xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task.Run%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法是启动计算密集型任务的建议的方法。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskFactory.StartNew%2A> method only when you require fine-grained control for a long-running, compute-bound task.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskFactory.StartNew%2A>方法仅在需要严格的控制长时间运行的、 计算密集型任务时。

trans-unit.source: This includes scenarios in which you want to control the following:
trans-unit.target: 这包括想要控制以下方案：

trans-unit.source: Task creation options.
trans-unit.target: 任务创建选项。

trans-unit.source: Tasks created by the <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task.Run%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method by default are created with the <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskCreationOptions.DenyChildAttach?displayProperty=nameWithType> option.
trans-unit.target: 创建的任务<xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task.Run%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法默认情况下的创建的<xref:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskCreationOptions.DenyChildAttach?displayProperty=nameWithType>选项。

trans-unit.source: To override this behavior, or to provide other <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskCreationOptions> options, call a <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskFactory.StartNew%2A> overload.
trans-unit.target: 若要替代此行为，或提供其他<xref:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskCreationOptions>选项，调用<xref:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskFactory.StartNew%2A>重载。

trans-unit.source: Parameter passing.
trans-unit.target: 参数传递。

trans-unit.source: The overloads of the <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task.Run%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method do not allow you to pass a parameter to the task delegate.
trans-unit.target: 重载<xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task.Run%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法不允许你将参数传递给任务委托。

trans-unit.source: Overloads of the <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskFactory.StartNew%2A> method do.
trans-unit.target: 重载的<xref:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskFactory.StartNew%2A>方法执行。

trans-unit.source: The task scheduler.
trans-unit.target: 任务计划程序。

trans-unit.source: The overloads of the <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task.Run%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method use the default task scheduler.
trans-unit.target: 重载<xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task.Run%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法使用默认任务计划程序。

trans-unit.source: To control the task scheduler, call a <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskFactory.StartNew%2A> overload with a `scheduler` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 若要控制任务计划程序，请调用<xref:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskFactory.StartNew%2A>重载`scheduler`参数。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see .
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅。

trans-unit.source: The action delegate to execute asynchronously.
trans-unit.target: 要异步执行的操作委托。

trans-unit.source: Creates and starts a task.
trans-unit.target: 创建并启动 任务。

trans-unit.source: The started task.
trans-unit.target: 已启动的任务。

trans-unit.source: Calling <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskFactory.StartNew%2A> is functionally equivalent to creating a task by using one of its constructors, and then calling the <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task.Start%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method to schedule the task for execution.
trans-unit.target: 调用<xref:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskFactory.StartNew%2A>功能上等效于通过使用其构造函数之一，然后再调用在创建任务<xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task.Start%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法来计划执行的任务。

trans-unit.source: Starting with the [!INCLUDE[net_v45](~/includes/net-v45-md.md)], you can use the <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task.Run%28System.Action%29?displayProperty=nameWithType> method as a quick way to call <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskFactory.StartNew%28System.Action%29> with default parameters.
trans-unit.target: 从开始[!INCLUDE[net_v45](~/includes/net-v45-md.md)]，你可以使用<xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task.Run%28System.Action%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>作为一种快速的方式来调用方法<xref:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskFactory.StartNew%28System.Action%29>具有默认参数。

trans-unit.source: Note, however, that there is a difference in behavior between the two methods regarding : <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task.Run%28System.Action%29?displayProperty=nameWithType> by default does not allow child tasks started with the <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskCreationOptions.AttachedToParent?displayProperty=nameWithType> option to attach to the current <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task> instance, whereas <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskFactory.StartNew%28System.Action%29> does.
trans-unit.target: 但请注意，没有两种方法之间的行为差异有关：<xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task.Run%28System.Action%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>默认情况下不允许子任务入门<xref:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskCreationOptions.AttachedToParent?displayProperty=nameWithType>附加到当前选项<xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task>实例，而<xref:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskFactory.StartNew%28System.Action%29>未。

trans-unit.source: For more information and code examples, see [Task.Run vs Task.Factory.StartNew](http://blogs.msdn.com/b/pfxteam/archive/2011/10/24/10229468.aspx) in the Parallel Programming with .NET blog.
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息和代码示例，请参阅[Task.Run vs Task.Factory.StartNew](http://blogs.msdn.com/b/pfxteam/archive/2011/10/24/10229468.aspx)中使用.NET 博客进行并行编程。

trans-unit.source: The following example uses the <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskFactory.StartNew%28System.Action%29> method to repeatedly invoke an <xref:System.Action> delegate that generates a random number, interprets it as a Unicode code point, converts it to a UTF16-encoded code unit, and displays information about the resulting character or characters.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例使用<xref:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskFactory.StartNew%28System.Action%29>要重复调用方法<xref:System.Action>生成一个随机数，委托将其解释为 Unicode 码位，将其转换为一个 UTF16 编码的代码单元，并显示有关所生成的信息字符或字符。

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="action" /> argument is null.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="action" /> 参数为 null。

trans-unit.target: 要异步执行的操作委托。

trans-unit.source: Calling `StartNew` is functionally equivalent to creating a Task using one of its constructors and then calling <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task.Start%2A> to schedule it for execution.
trans-unit.target: 调用`StartNew`功能上等效于创建任务使用其构造函数并调用之一<xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task.Start%2A>来计划它的执行。

trans-unit.source: Starting with the [!INCLUDE[net_v45](~/includes/net-v45-md.md)], you can use the <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task.Run%28System.Action%2CSystem.Threading.CancellationToken%29?displayProperty=nameWithType> method as a quick way to call <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskFactory.StartNew%28System.Action%2CSystem.Threading.CancellationToken%29> with default parameters.
trans-unit.target: 从开始[!INCLUDE[net_v45](~/includes/net-v45-md.md)]，你可以使用<xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task.Run%28System.Action%2CSystem.Threading.CancellationToken%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>作为一种快速的方式来调用方法<xref:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskFactory.StartNew%28System.Action%2CSystem.Threading.CancellationToken%29>具有默认参数。

trans-unit.source: Note, however, that there is a difference in behavior between the two methods regarding : <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task.Run%28System.Action%2CSystem.Threading.CancellationToken%29?displayProperty=nameWithType> by default does not allow child tasks started with the <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskCreationOptions.AttachedToParent?displayProperty=nameWithType> option to attach to the current <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task> instance, whereas <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskFactory.StartNew%28System.Action%2CSystem.Threading.CancellationToken%29> does.
trans-unit.target: 但请注意，没有两种方法之间的行为差异有关：<xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task.Run%28System.Action%2CSystem.Threading.CancellationToken%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>默认情况下不允许子任务入门<xref:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskCreationOptions.AttachedToParent?displayProperty=nameWithType>附加到当前选项<xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task>实例，而<xref:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskFactory.StartNew%28System.Action%2CSystem.Threading.CancellationToken%29>未。

trans-unit.source: For more information and code examples, see [Task.Run vs Task.Factory.StartNew](http://blogs.msdn.com/b/pfxteam/archive/2011/10/24/10229468.aspx) in the Parallel Programming with .NET blog.
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息和代码示例，请参阅[Task.Run vs Task.Factory.StartNew](http://blogs.msdn.com/b/pfxteam/archive/2011/10/24/10229468.aspx)中使用.NET 博客进行并行编程。

trans-unit.source: The following example calls the <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskFactory.StartNew%28System.Action%2CSystem.Threading.CancellationToken%29> method to create a task that iterates the files in the C:\Windows\System32 directory.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例调用<xref:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskFactory.StartNew%28System.Action%2CSystem.Threading.CancellationToken%29>方法来创建一个任务，它循环 C:\Windows\System32 目录中的文件。

trans-unit.source: The lambda expression calls the <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Parallel.ForEach%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method to add information about each file to a <xref:System.Collections.Generic.List%601> object.
trans-unit.target: Lambda 表达式调用<xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Parallel.ForEach%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法将添加到每个文件的信息<xref:System.Collections.Generic.List%601>对象。

trans-unit.source: Each detached nested task invoked by the <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Parallel.ForEach%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> loop checks the state of the cancellation token and, if cancellation is requested, calls the <xref:System.Threading.CancellationToken.ThrowIfCancellationRequested%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method.
trans-unit.target: 每个分离的嵌套的任务由调用<xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Parallel.ForEach%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>循环检查取消标记的状态，并且如果已请求取消，将调用<xref:System.Threading.CancellationToken.ThrowIfCancellationRequested%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Threading.CancellationToken.ThrowIfCancellationRequested%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method throws an <xref:System.OperationCanceledException> exception that is handled in a `catch` block when the calling thread calls the <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task.Wait%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Threading.CancellationToken.ThrowIfCancellationRequested%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法抛出异常<xref:System.OperationCanceledException>中处理的异常`catch`时调用的线程调用阻止<xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task.Wait%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法。

trans-unit.source: The provided <see cref="T:System.Threading.CancellationToken" /> has already been disposed.
trans-unit.target: 提供的 <see cref="T:System.Threading.CancellationToken" /> 已被释放。

trans-unit.source: The following example defines an array of 6-letter words.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例定义 6 字母单词的数组。

trans-unit.source: Each word is then passed to an <xref:System.Action%601> delegate, which scrambles the word and displays the original word and its scrambled version.
trans-unit.target: 每个单词然后传递给<xref:System.Action%601>委托，委托进行加密单词，并显示原始 word 和其经过编码的版本。

trans-unit.source: Note that the example initializes a single random number generator, which is protected by a lock.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，该示例初始化单个随机数生成器，这由锁保护。

trans-unit.source: For the need of a lock, see "The System.Random class and thread safety" in the <xref:System.Random> class topic.
trans-unit.target: 有关锁的需要，请参阅"System.Random 类和线程安全"<xref:System.Random>类主题。

trans-unit.source: The following example defines an array of 6-letter words.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例定义 6 字母单词的数组。

trans-unit.source: Each word is then passed to an <xref:System.Action%601> delegate, which scrambles the word and displays the original word and its scrambled version.
trans-unit.target: 每个单词然后传递给<xref:System.Action%601>委托，委托进行加密单词，并显示原始 word 和其经过编码的版本。

trans-unit.source: Note that the example initializes a single random number generator, which is protected by a lock.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，该示例初始化单个随机数生成器，这由锁保护。

trans-unit.source: For the need of a lock, see "The System.Random class and thread safety" in the <xref:System.Random> class topic.
trans-unit.target: 有关锁的需要，请参阅"System.Random 类和线程安全"<xref:System.Random>类主题。

trans-unit.source: To handle the possibility of corruption of the random number generator, a cancellation token is passed to task.
trans-unit.target: 若要处理的随机数生成器的损坏的可能性，请传递一个取消标记任务。

trans-unit.source: If two random numbers equal zero, the method assumes that the random number generator is corrupted and sets the cancellation token.
trans-unit.target: 如果两个随机数等于零，则该方法假定随机数生成器已损坏，并设置取消标记。

trans-unit.source: Before sorting the `chars` array that contains the six characters in a word, the method calls the <xref:System.Threading.CancellationToken.ThrowIfCancellationRequested%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method to throw an <xref:System.OperationCanceledException> if the token has been canceled.
trans-unit.target: 在排序之前`chars`数组，其中包含了六个单词中, 字符的方法调用<xref:System.Threading.CancellationToken.ThrowIfCancellationRequested%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法会引发<xref:System.OperationCanceledException>如果标记已取消。

trans-unit.target: 提供的 <see cref="T:System.Threading.CancellationToken" /> 已被释放。

trans-unit.source: Calling StartNew is functionally equivalent to creating a Task using one of its constructors and then calling <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task.Start%2A> to schedule it for execution.
trans-unit.target: 调用 StartNew 在功能上等效于创建任务使用其构造函数并调用之一<xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task.Start%2A>来计划它的执行。

trans-unit.source: Starting with the [!INCLUDE[net_v45](~/includes/net-v45-md.md)], you can use the <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task.Run%2A> method with an <xref:System.Action> object as a quick way to call <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskFactory.StartNew%2A> with default parameters.
trans-unit.target: 从开始[!INCLUDE[net_v45](~/includes/net-v45-md.md)]，你可以使用<xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task.Run%2A>方法替换<xref:System.Action>对象作为一种快速的方式来调用<xref:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskFactory.StartNew%2A>具有默认参数。

trans-unit.source: For more information and code examples, see [Task.Run vs Task.Factory.StartNew](http://blogs.msdn.com/b/pfxteam/archive/2011/10/24/10229468.aspx) in the Parallel Programming with .NET blog.

trans-unit.source: Calling <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskFactory.StartNew%2A> is functionally equivalent to creating a <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task%601> using one of its constructors and then calling <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task.Start%2A> to schedule it for execution.
trans-unit.target: 调用<xref:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskFactory.StartNew%2A>功能上等效于创建<xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task%601>使用其构造函数之一，然后再调用<xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task.Start%2A>来计划它的执行。

trans-unit.source: Starting with the [!INCLUDE[net_v45](~/includes/net-v45-md.md)], you can call the <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task.Run%60%601%28System.Func%7B%60%600%7D%29?displayProperty=nameWithType> method as a quick way to call <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskFactory.StartNew%2A> with default parameters.
trans-unit.target: 从开始[!INCLUDE[net_v45](~/includes/net-v45-md.md)]，可以调用<xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task.Run%60%601%28System.Func%7B%60%600%7D%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>作为一种快速的方式来调用方法<xref:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskFactory.StartNew%2A>具有默认参数。

trans-unit.source: Note, however, that there is a difference in behavior between the two methods regarding : <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task.Run%60%601%28System.Func%7B%60%600%7D%29?displayProperty=nameWithType> by default does not allow child tasks started with the <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskCreationOptions.AttachedToParent?displayProperty=nameWithType> option to attach to the current <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task%601> instance, whereas <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskFactory.StartNew%60%601%28System.Func%7B%60%600%7D%29> does.
trans-unit.target: 但请注意，没有两种方法之间的行为差异有关：<xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task.Run%60%601%28System.Func%7B%60%600%7D%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>默认情况下不允许子任务入门<xref:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskCreationOptions.AttachedToParent?displayProperty=nameWithType>附加到当前选项<xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task%601>实例，而<xref:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskFactory.StartNew%60%601%28System.Func%7B%60%600%7D%29>未。

trans-unit.source: For more information and code examples, see the entry [Task.Run vs. Task.Factory.StartNew](http://blogs.msdn.com/b/pfxteam/archive/2011/10/24/10229468.aspx) in the Parallel Programming with .NET blog.
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息和代码示例，请参阅输入[Task.Run vs。Task.Factory.StartNew](http://blogs.msdn.com/b/pfxteam/archive/2011/10/24/10229468.aspx)中使用.NET 博客进行并行编程。

trans-unit.source: The following example is a simple addition app that generates two random numbers and prompts the user to enter their sum.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例是一个简单的加法应用生成两个随机数，系统将提示用户输入其总和。

trans-unit.source: It then indicates whether the answer is correct or, if the user's response is not a valid number, prompts the user to re-enter a valid number.
trans-unit.target: 然后，它指示答案是否正确还是，如果用户的响应不是有效的数字，则会提示用户重新输入一个有效数字。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskFactory.StartNew%2A> is used to create the <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task%601> objects that return the random numbers to add.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskFactory.StartNew%2A>用于创建<xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task%601>返回要添加的随机数字的对象。

trans-unit.source: Note, however, that there is a difference in behavior between the two methods regarding : <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task.Run%60%601%28System.Func%7B%60%600%7D%2CSystem.Threading.CancellationToken%29?displayProperty=nameWithType> by default does not allow child tasks started with the <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskCreationOptions.AttachedToParent?displayProperty=nameWithType> option to attach to the current <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task%601> instance, whereas <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskFactory.StartNew%60%601%28System.Func%7B%60%600%7D%2CSystem.Threading.CancellationToken%29> does.
trans-unit.target: 但请注意，没有两种方法之间的行为差异有关：<xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task.Run%60%601%28System.Func%7B%60%600%7D%2CSystem.Threading.CancellationToken%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>默认情况下不允许子任务入门<xref:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskCreationOptions.AttachedToParent?displayProperty=nameWithType>附加到当前选项<xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task%601>实例，而<xref:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskFactory.StartNew%60%601%28System.Func%7B%60%600%7D%2CSystem.Threading.CancellationToken%29>未。

trans-unit.source: For more information and code examples, see the entry [Task.Run vs. Task.Factory.StartNew](http://blogs.msdn.com/b/pfxteam/archive/2011/10/24/10229468.aspx) in the Parallel Programming with .NET blog.
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息和代码示例，请参阅输入[Task.Run vs。Task.Factory.StartNew](http://blogs.msdn.com/b/pfxteam/archive/2011/10/24/10229468.aspx)中使用.NET 博客进行并行编程。

trans-unit.source: The following example uses two tasks to compute the Fibonacci sequence ending in F100 = F100-1 + F100-2 with seed values F1= 1, F2 = 1 and F1 = 0, F2= 1.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例使用两个任务来计算以 F100 斐波那契序列使用种子值 F1 = F100 1 + F100 2 = 1，F2 = 1 且 F1 = 0，F2 = 1。

trans-unit.source: Approximately half of the time, a cancellation token is set as the operations execute.
trans-unit.target: 大约一半的时间，取消标记被设置为操作执行。

trans-unit.source: The output from the example shows the result if the two tasks complete successfully and if the token is cancelled.
trans-unit.target: 如果两个任务成功完成，并且标记被取消时，该示例的输出将显示结果。

trans-unit.source: The provided <see cref="T:System.Threading.CancellationToken" /> has already been disposed.
trans-unit.target: 提供的 <see cref="T:System.Threading.CancellationToken" /> 已被释放。

trans-unit.target: 可通过 <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Task`1" /> 获得的结果的类型。

trans-unit.source: Calling StartNew is functionally equivalent to creating a <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task%601> using one of its constructors and then calling <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task.Start%2A> to schedule it for execution.
trans-unit.target: 调用 StartNew 在功能上等效于创建<xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task%601>使用其构造函数之一，然后再调用<xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task.Start%2A>来计划它的执行。

trans-unit.source: Starting with the [!INCLUDE[net_v45](~/includes/net-v45-md.md)], you can use the <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task.Run%2A> method with an <xref:System.Action> object as a quick way to call <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskFactory.StartNew%2A> with default parameters.
trans-unit.target: 从开始[!INCLUDE[net_v45](~/includes/net-v45-md.md)]，你可以使用<xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task.Run%2A>方法替换<xref:System.Action>对象作为一种快速的方式来调用<xref:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskFactory.StartNew%2A>具有默认参数。

trans-unit.source: For more information and code examples, see the entry [Task.Run vs. Task.Factory.StartNew](http://blogs.msdn.com/b/pfxteam/archive/2011/10/24/10229468.aspx) in the Parallel Programming with .NET blog.
